title: Razer s Blade   packs an   core Intel CPU and RTX   Super
description: Razer has unveiled the   Blade   Advanced with more gaming and content creation power  along with one long overdue addition  To start with  the Advanced model is the first Razer Blade with an   core CPU  namely the  th generation Intel Core i     Tha
content: The Blade   Advanced also comes with NVIDIA s latest RTX     Super GPUs with Max Q design  The new chips are not only faster than NVIDIA s last RTX flagships  the RTX   and    but feature NVIDIA s latest efficiency boosting Max Q tweaks like Adva    chars
